about_the_game:
Mayhem's World is an exciting open world fighting game that is currently in development by a single person since 2022. The game takes place in a vast and immersive world filled with dangerous enemies, challenging missions, and play the game at any pace they want. You could play though the game as fast as possible, or take your time and enjoy the journey!

Mayhem's World is not just your average open-world fighting game; it's an epic journey through a meticulously crafted universe, teeming with vibrant landscapes, formidable adversaries, and thrilling adventures.

Set in a sprawling and immersive world, players will find themselves immersed in a rich tapestry of lore and mythology, where every corner holds secrets waiting to be uncovered. From sprawling cities bustling with life to serene wilderness teeming with exotic creatures, the world of Mayhem's World offers endless opportunities for exploration and discovery.

One of the game's standout features is its open-ended gameplay, allowing players to tackle challenges in any order they choose. Want to dive headfirst into the action and take on powerful bosses? Go for it. Prefer to take your time and explore every nook and cranny of the world? You can do that too.

Mayhem's World also boasts a robust progression system, allowing players to customize their characters and playstyles to suit their preferences. Whether you prefer to focus on brute strength, lightning-fast agility, or powerful magic, there are countless ways to build and develop your character.

But perhaps the most compelling aspect of Mayhem's World is the sense of freedom it offers. In this vast and dynamic world, players are free to write their own stories, forge their own destinies, and ultimately become the hero—or villain—they were meant to be. With its immersive world, exhilarating combat, and endless possibilities, Mayhem's World is shaping up to be an unforgettable gaming experience for players around the globe.


Mayhem's World gives you multiple options on how to play. You could play as a heavy hitting sword fighting machine, play as a fast paced unhittable swordsman/swordswoman, play as the healer in the back of the pack, play as the support and use magic to attack from the backlines!

You don't even need to fight! You could play as a simple Farmer and enjoy the simple life, not caring about what's happening in other places. Or you could just adventure the world, and enjoy the scenery!

If speed and agility are more your style, you can opt to play as a nimble swordsman or swordswoman, darting in and out of combat with lightning-fast reflexes. With swift strikes and unparalleled agility, you'll be able to evade enemy attacks with ease and strike back with precision.

Healers play a vital role in any adventuring party, using their magic to restore health and bolster their allies' strength. With powerful healing spells and protective wards, you'll keep your comrades alive and fighting for victory.

Support characters are the unsung heroes of the battlefield, using their magic to manipulate the elements and control the flow of combat from afar. Whether raining down fiery destruction from above or summoning protective barriers to shield your allies, you'll be the backbone of your team.

No matter your preferred playstyle, Mayhem's World offers endless opportunities for adventure and excitement, ensuring that every player can find their place in this epic fantasy universe.


In addition to the intense fighting action, or peaceful tranquility, Mayhem's World also boasts a rich and engaging story, complete with complex characters, branching paths, and surprising plot twists. Players will have to make difficult choices along the way that will shape the direction of the story and the fate of the game world itself.

In Mayhem's World, the story transcends time itself, beginning in the primordial chaos before the creation of the multiverse. Players will unravel the mysteries of the universe as they journey through ancient civilizations, encountering legendary figures and mythical beings along the way.

From the Celestial Rebellion that shook the very foundations of reality to the Great Universal War that threatened to tear the fabric of existence apart, players will witness the epic struggles of the cosmos firsthand. They'll forge alliances with powerful beings like the Universals confronting ancient evils and uncovering hidden truths that will shape the destiny of the universe.

But the story of Mayhem's World is not just about epic battles and cosmic conflicts. It's also about personal growth and self-discovery, as players embark on quests to uncover their own destinies and unlock the secrets of their true potential. Along the way, they'll form bonds with memorable characters, forge alliances with unlikely allies, and ultimately decide the fate of the universe itself.

With its rich narrative and dynamic storytelling, Mayhem's World offers players an immersive and unforgettable experience that will keep them coming back for more, long after the final battle has been won...

All of this lore is completely available to anyone who would like to see it! all available on


The world of Mayhem's World is immense, with the world completely different from any other! with a completely new and well thought out world of hierarchy!

you start with the first place you can live on, a Planet floating in space in a Solar System, inside a Galaxy, inside a Universe, inside a Zephyrverse, inside Celestialverse, inside the Eververse, and finally! Inside the Multiverse!

All of the places are possible to get to eventually, and fight different creatures, explore places of extremely odd and different worlds...
Meet new people with odd personalities, shopkeepers with a little more up their sleeves, people who just want you to help them write their autobiography, and giant gods of horror who just want you dead.


The World is your sandbox, in Mayhem's World
